snippet.title: Roller League Gameplay - #MixAndGameJam 2019
snippet.description:
Our submission for the Mix and Game Jam 2019.
A fun and addictive multiplayer game, based on the main mechanic of Rocket League (Score a ball much bigger than you), you play as one of our joyful roller skater and try to score the ball as much as you can before the time runs out.

Oh, and you have a gun to help you on your quest!

By the way, did we mention that you can use any controller?
Xbox Controller
Keyboard
Even the Mouse!

Its a fun party for everyone.

Watita Games
contact@watitagames.com
Visit us at: watitagames.com
